data.enText: to succeed in attracting and keeping sb's attention and interest

data.chText: 这是一部令人赏心悦目的影片。
data.enText: It is a movie that engages both the mind and the eye.
to employ sb to do a particular job
He is currently engaged as a consultant.

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.chText: 与…建立密切关系；尽力理解
data.enText: to become involved with and try to understand sth/sb

data.chText: 她能够与年轻人心意相通。
data.enText: She has the ability to engage with young minds.

data.chText: 与（某人）交战；与（某人）开战
data.enText: to begin fighting with sb
to engage the enemy
when a part of a machine engages , or when you engage it, it fits together with another part of the machine and the machine begins to work

data.chText: 齿轮一个个啮合在一起。
data.enText: One cogwheel engages with the next.
The cogwheels are not engaging.
Engage the clutch before selecting a gear.
engage in sth
engage sb in sth
to take part in sth; to make sb take part in sth

data.chText: 他甚至在监狱里还继续从事犯罪活动。
data.enText: Even in prison, he continued to engage in criminal activities.

data.chText: 她用尽办法要他跟她谈话。
data.enText: She tried desperately to engage him in conversation .

ex.chText: 他班上的女生们很乐意参加这次舞会。
ex.enText: The girls in his class are willing to participate in the dancing party.
Who will participate in these discussions?

synonyms.bx: 指参与某活动或事件，含积极、主动之意，常后接介词 in。

ex.enText: How many people attended the meeting?

ex.chText: 她没解释不能出席的原因。
ex.enText: She didn't explain why she was unable to attend.

synonyms.bx: 多指出席会议、参加学术活动、听课等。

ex.chText: 现在，上班族很少定期进行锻炼。
ex.enText: Nowadays, office workers rarely engage in regular exercise.

ex.chText: 由于一些历史和现实原因，两党陷入了日益加剧的政治斗争。
ex.enText: Due to some historical and practical reasons, the two parties engaged upon an escalating political struggle.

ex.chText: 虽然生病了，他还是积极地参与文件的翻译。
ex.enText: Despite his illness, he remained actively engaged in translating documents.

synonyms.bx: 指做某事或参与某项活动，常后接介词 in/on/upon。

ex.enText: He has made up his mind to join the army.
She joined the Labour Party in April.

ex.chText: 很多人参与了禁止性别歧视的运动。
ex.enText: Many have joined the campaign to end gender discrimination.

ex.chText: 他妻子搬来和他在新家共同生活。
ex.enText: His wife moved in to join him in their new home.

synonyms.bx: 指加入组织、团体等，也指与他人一同做某事，或去某人那里与其呆在一起或做某事。

ex.chText: 大部分参加抗议的学生来自同一所学校。
ex.enText: The majority of the students who took part in the protest came from the same school.

ex.chText: 他总是积极参与政治活动。
ex.enText: He always takes an active part in politics.

data.enText: engage in sth
engage sb in sth
to take part in sth; to make sb take part in sth

data.chText: 他甚至在监狱里还继续从事犯罪活动。
data.enText: Even in prison, he continued to engage in criminal activities.

data.chText: 她用尽办法要他跟她谈话。
data.enText: She tried desperately to engage him in conversation .

example: make sure the gear is engaged

tr: consume all of one's attention or time
example: Her interest in butterflies absorbs her completely

tr: engage for service under a term of contract
example: We took an apartment on a quiet street
Shall we take a guide in Rome?
engage aid, help, services, or support

tr: carry out or participate in an activity

example: Napoleon and Hitler waged war against all of Europe
They hired two new secretaries in the department
How many people has she employed?

value.def: If you engage in an activity, you do it or are actively involved with it.

example.ex: I have never engaged in the drug trade...
example.tran: 我从未参与过毒品交易。

example.ex: You can engage in croquet on the south lawn.
example.tran: 你可以参加南边草坪上的槌球游戏。

value.def: If something engages you or your attention or interest, it keeps you interested in it and thinking about it.

example.ex: They never learned skills to engage the attention of the others.
example.tran: 他们从未学过吸引他人注意的技巧。

value.def: If you engage someone in conversation, you have a conversation with them.

example.ex: They tried to engage him in conversation...
We want to engage recognized leaders in discussion.
example.tran: 我们想和公认的领袖们进行讨论。

value.def: If you engage with something or with a group of people, you get involved with that thing or group and feel that you are connected with it or have real contact with it.

example.ex: She found it hard to engage with office life...
example.tran: 她发现很难适应办公室生活。

example.ex: She had vowed to go out of her way to engage with the Irish people at local community level.
example.tran: 她已经发誓要努力和当地的爱尔兰人建立关系。

example.ex: And she, too, suffers from a lack of critical engagement with the literary texts.
example.tran: 她也因为对文学作品缺乏鉴赏力而非常痛苦。

value.def: If you engage someone to do a particular job, you appoint them to do it.

example.ex: We engaged the services of a recognised engineer...
example.tran: 我们雇用了一个公认的杰出工程师。

example.ex: He had been able to engage some staff.
example.tran: 他已经能够雇用一些员工。

value.def: When a part of a machine or other mechanism engages or when you engage it, it moves into a position where it fits into something else.

example.ex: Press the lever until you hear the catch engage.
example.tran: 压下挡杆，直到听到挡挂好。

example.ex: ...a lesson in how to engage the four-wheel drive.
example.tran: 如何使四轮驱动啮合的课程

value.def: When a military force engages the enemy, it attacks them and starts a battle.

example.ex: It could engage the enemy beyond the range of hostile torpedoes.
example.tran: 从这可以避开敌方鱼雷区对敌人发动进攻。

trans: 绿色环保参与计划；绿色接触
